source.pc: Welcome to MCB’s Online Training for Peer Specialists
These free online training programs explore a variety of topics to help you succeed as a peer and work effectively with those beginning or continuing their recovery journey.

Our training programs provide you with the knowledge and skills to better support the persons you serve on their recovery journey. The programs educate and challenge your understanding about opioids and substance use as well as build mindfulness of cultural differences and your ability to navigate those differences.
Funding for this training is made possible through a grant from the Minnesota Department of Human Services Behavioral Health Division.
Self-register to begin or, if you are a returning learner, sign in to continue your training.
For any technical or connection issues, please email {0}.

target.pc: Kusoo dhawaaw Tobababarka Onleynka ah ee MCB ee Xirfadlayaasha Isku-filkaa

Tobabaradan bilaashka waxa ay ka hadlayaan mowduucyo kala duwan si ay kaaga caawiyaan in aad guul kaarto ka dhalin yaro ahaan iyo in aad si wanaagsan ula shaqeyso kuwa bilaabaya ama ku jiro safarkooda dib usoo kabasho.
Qorshayaashena tobabar waxa ay ku sinayaan aqoonta iyo xirfada aad u baahan tahay si aad sida ugu wanaagsan ugu kaalmeyso shaqsiyaadka aad u adeegeyso ee soo kabashada ku jiro.
Maal gelinta tobabarkan waxaa suurto geliyay deeq ka timid Waaxda Caafimaaka Dhaqanka ee Adeega Bini’aadamka Minnesota (Minnesota Department of Human Services Behavioral Health Division).
Is diwaan geli si aad u bilaawdo ama, haddii aad tahay arday soo noqonaya, soo gal si aad u sii wado tobabarka.
Waxii cilad farsamo iyo qadka, fadlan la xiriir ciwaankan {0}.

segment.source: Welcome, and thank you for your purchase! To begin, please watch the video to your left, test your browser, and then sign in using your username and password.
segment.target: Soo dhawaaw, waad ku mahadsan tahay iibsashadaada! Si aad u bilaawdo, fadlan daawo muuqalka dhanka bidix, tijaabi barowserkaaga, kadibna soo gal adigoo isticmaalaya magaca-garashadaada iyo nambar sireedkaaga.
Ardayda diwaan gashan halkan soo gal.
Ardayda cusub halkan iska diwaan geli.
Mar Kale Ku Celi Nambar Sireedka

Tababbarka Opioid Ka Ee Khubarada Isku Faca Ah

segment.source: The objective of the course is to provide peer specialists with information about the principals and characteristics of opioid use disorders and approaches to treatment and recovery (e.g., medication assistant treatment) so peers are informed and prepared to support the individuals they serve.
segment.target: Ujeedka koorsadu waa in xirfadlayaasha isku asaaga helaan warbixin ku saleysan shuruucda iyo dabeecadaha isiticmaalka xun ee opioidka iyo hababka loola tacaalo daweynta iyo dib uuga soo kabashada.

segment.source: A timely update to the opioid crisis, which has evolved from opioid over-prescription to one of growing illegal access everywhere.
segment.target: Warbixin degdeg ah oo mushkiladaha opioids, taasoo kasoo baxday qorista xad-dhaafka ee opoid ayaa mid kamida isticmaalka sharci darrada ee meelkasta.

segment.source: Introduction to Culturally Affirming Peer Support
segment.target: Hordhaca Caawimo Asaag oo Dhaqan ahaan Haboon

segment.source: Introduction to Culturally Affirming Peer Support
segment.target: Hordhaca Caawimo Asaag oo Dhaqan ahaan Haboon

segment.source: The course provides peer specialists and others with a professional interest in substance use disorder recovery, insight into six of Minnesota’s diverse cultures, and learning experiences in cultural responsiveness. The course explores cultural differences and encourages peer specialists to be mindful of such differences and how they impact their relationship with the persons they serve. Participants work through real-world interactive exercises that help build skills for engaging and productive relationships with persons from diverse cultures.
segment.target: Kooraskani wuxuu siinayaa khubarada asagaa iyo dadka kale ee leh xirfad danaynaya kasoo kabashada isticmaalka mukhaabaraadka, aragtida lixda dhaqan ee kala duwane Minnesota, iyo khibrada waxbarasho ee jawaabaha dhaqanka. Kooraskani wuxuu raadinayaa kala duwanaanshaha dhaqan wuxuuna ku dhiirinayaa khubaradu inay ka warqabaan kala duwanaanshaha iyo sida ay u saameeyaan xidhiidhka dadka ay u adeegaan. Kaqeybgalayaashu waxay ka shaqeeyaan jimicsiyada khibrada dhabta ee ka saacidaysa dhisida xirfadaha xidhiidhada waxtarka leh ee shakhsiyaadka dhaqamada kala duwan.

segment.source: Lesson One: History and Overview of the Opioid Epidemic
segment.target: Casharka Kowaad: Taariikhda iyo Dulmarka Guud ee Caabuqa Opioidka

segment.source: Lesson Two: Opioids 101 — A Brief Overview of the Types and Effects of Opioids
segment.target: Casharka Labaad: Opioids ka 101 — Dulmar kooban oo ku saabsan Noocyada iyo Saamaynta Opioids

segment.source: Lesson Three: Opioid Use Disorder Treatment and Recovery
segment.target: Casharka Saddexaad: Dhibaatada Isticmaalka Opioid ka, Daawaynta iyo kasoo kabashada

segment.source: Opioid Training for Peer Specialists Completion Certificate
segment.target: Shahaadada Dhammeystirka Tababarka Opioid Ka Ee Khubarada Isku Faca A

segment.source: New and Emerging Opioids: A Supplement to Opioid Training for Peer Specialists
segment.target: Opioids Cusub iyo Kuwa soo Baxaaya: Tababarka Opioid Ka Ee Khubarada Isku Faca Ah

segment.source: New and Emerging Opioids Completion Certificate
segment.target: Shahaadada Dhammeystirka Opioids Cusub iyo Kuwa soo Baxaaya

segment.source: Lesson One: Minnesota’s Mosaic of Cultures
Lesson Two: The Principles of Cultural Affirmation
Lesson Three: Putting Cultural Responsiveness into Action
segment.target: Casharka Saddexaad: Fulinaya Jawaab Celinta Dhaqanka

segment.source: Culturally Affirming Peer Support Completion Certificate
segment.target: Shahaadada Dhammeystirka Tababarka Opioid ee Khubarada Asagaa

segment.source: In this lesson, you’ll learn appropriate terminology in describing substance use disorders such as Opioid Use Disorder (OUD), the incidence rates of national substance use and use disorders, the history of opioid use, the current state of opioid use nationally and in Minnesota, and how to use this knowledge to bring an informed approach to interactions with persons you serve.
segment.target: Casharkan, waxaad baran doonta erayada ku haboon ee lagu sharaxo dhibaatoyinka isku dhexyaac ee isticmaalka balwada sida Isku Dhexyaaca Isticmaalka Opioidka (OUD), heerka dhacdooyinka ee isticmaalka qaranka iyo isku dhexyaaca, taariikhda isticmaalka opioidka, xaalada ee isticmaalka opioidka hadda ee qaranka iyo Minnesota, iyo sida loo isticmaalo ayada aqoonka lagu keenayo habraac warbixin laga warhayo ee shaqsiyaadka aad u adeegeyso.

segment.source: In this lesson, you’ll learn to identify and describe the types of opioids and their derivation, describe how opioids affect the brain and body, describe the physical process through which opioids create dependence, and consider how to apply this information when you provide support to an individual with an Opioid Use Disorder (OUD).
segment.target: Casharkan, waxaad baran doonta sida loo garto loona sharaxo nuucyada kala duwan ee opioidka iyo sidee ukala baxaan, sharax sida opioidku u sameyo maskaxda iyo jirka, sharax habraaca jirka ee uu opioidku ku noqodo mid madax banaan, iyo in tixgelinta sida loo isticmaalo warbixintan marka aad siineyso kaalmo shaqsi qabo Isku Dhexyaaca Isticmaalka Opioidka (OUD).

segment.source: In this lesson, you’ll learn to describe a peer’s role in treatment and recovery based on the peer recovery domains, identify maintenance and overdose reversal medications, identify non-medication options used in treatment and recovery, and learn about — and practice — person-centered conversational and motivational interviewing techniques when providing support to persons you serve.
segment.target: Casharkan, waxaad ku baran doonta sida loo sharaxo doorka shaqsiga asaagaga ah ee daweynta iyo dib usoo kabashada ee dhalinta, garashada dayactirka iyo dib uga noqoshada iska badinta daawooyinka, garashada fursadaha aan daawooyinka ku saleysneen ee loo isticmaalo daweynta iyo dib u kabashada, iyo wax kabarashada — iyo ku dhaqanka — wada hadalada ku saleysn -shaqasiga iyo xirfadaha wareysiga dhiiro gelinta marka aad caawineyso qofka aad u adeegeyso.

segment.source: To view and print your certificate press the Launch button.
segment.target: Si aad dib ugu fiirisid uguna daabacdid shahaadadaada taabo Daar badhanka ah.

segment.source: The course examines the evolving opioid crisis with an emphasis on illegal opioids, synthetic opioid-like substances, and stimulants that are becoming increasingly available everywhere in Minnesota. The course familiarizes peer specialists and others with a professional interest in substance use and recovery with the nature of the new drugs and the risks and dangers posed by each.
segment.target: Kooraskani wuxuu baadhayaa mushkiladaha soo baxaya ee opioid ee xooga saaraya opioid sharci darada ah, opioid ka la sameeyo sida daroogada, iyo mukhaadaraadka ayaa si aad ah ugusoo badanaya Minnesota. Koorasku wuxuu garanayaa khubarada iyo dadka kale ee leh xirfad islamarkaana daneynaya kasoo kabashada daroogooyinka ee nooca daroogooyinka cusub iyo halisa iyo khataraha ay keenaan.

segment.source: To view and print your certificate press the Launch button.
segment.target: Si aad dib ugu fiirisid uguna daabacdid shahaadadaada taabo Daar badhanka ah.

segment.source: Lesson One identifies Minnesota’s wide range of diverse cultures and surveys six prominent cultures, emphasizing language, customs, values, and traditions as key distinguishing characteristics of each. Participants acquire knowledge and skills for navigating cultural differences among those they serve, building cultural responsiveness and competence to help strengthen those relationships.
segment.target: Casharka Kowaad wuxuu aqoonsanayaa heerarka kala dwan ee dhaqanka Minnesota iyo lixda dhaqan ee ugu caansan, xoojinta luuqada, caadooyinka, qiyamka, iyo dhaqamada furaha ah kalasaarida astaamaha midkasta. Kaqeybgalayaash waxay helayaan aqoonta iyo xirfadaha dhexmarida kala duwanaanshaha u dhaxeeya kuwaasi ay u adeegaan, dhisida kajawaabaya dhaqamada iyo awooda lagu xoojinaayo xidhiidhida.

segment.source: Lesson Two focuses on cultural awareness and introduces key principles for initiating and maintaining productive interactions and relationships with persons from diverse cultures. The lesson explores cultural differences and their impact on communication. It emphasizes skills to overcome barriers and provide culturally affirming support.
segment.target: Casharka Labaad wuxuu diirada saarayaa wacyigalinta dhaqanka wuxuu keenayab shuruucda furaha u ah in lagu bilaabo laguna ilaaliyo macaamilka waxtarka leh iyo xidhiidhada shakhsiyaadka dhaqamada kala duwan. Casharku wuxuu raadinayaa kala duwanaanshaha iyo saameyntooda wada-xidhiidhka. Waxay xoojinaysaa xirfadaha lagaga guulaysanayo caqabadaha laguna bixinaayo caawimo dhaqan ahaan haboon.

segment.source: Lesson Three transitions from learning to doing by practicing concepts learned in previous lessons. Participants are challenged to identify and successfully bridge cultural differences by engaging in several interactive scenarios. This learn-by-doing approach enables participants to develop and grow their ability to navigate relationships with people from different cultures by establishing rapport, adjusting communication styles, and avoiding and repairing microaggressions.
segment.target: Casharka Saddexaad kala guurka waxbarashada la sameynayo iyadoo laga qeybagalaayo fikradaha lagu bartay casharada hore. Kaqeybgalayaasha waxa lagu imtaxaanayaa inay aqoonsadaan oo si guul leh ay u dhisaan biriijyada kala duwanaanshaha dhaqan iyagoo ka hawlgalaaya dhowr arimood. Tani waxa lagu baran karaa iyadoo la sameynaayo nidaamka awood siinaya kaqeybgalayaash inay kobcaan oo koriyaan awoodooda adeegsiga xidhiidhada dadka dhaqamada kala duwan iyadoo la asaasayo xidhiidhka, lana saxaayo qaababka wada-xidhiidh, lana iska ilaalinaayo oo la dayac tiraayo gardarooyinka sahlan.

segment.source: To view and print your certificate press the Launch button.
segment.target: Si aad dib ugu fiirisid uguna daabacdid shahaadadaada taabo Daar badhanka ah.

segment.source: Some of the information you provided does not match our records. Please re-enter your username and password. Then click Sign In.
segment.target: Qaar kamida xogta aad soo gudbisay kuma jirto keydka xogteena. Fadlan dib u geli magac-garashadaada iyo nambar sireedkaaga. Kadib ku dhufo Gal gudaha.

segment.source: Some of the information you provided does not match our records. Please re-enter your username and password. Then click Sign In.
segment.target: Qaar kamida xogta aad soo gudbisay kuma jirto keydka xogteena. Fadlan dib u geli magac-garashadaada iyo nambar sireedkaaga. Kadib ku dhufo Gal gudaha.
Qaar kamida godadka loo baahan yahay ayaa kaa maqan.

segment.source: The last name field is required.
segment.target: Godka magaca labaad waa loo baahan yahay.

segment.source: The email address field is required.
segment.target: Godka ciwaanka iimeylka waa loo baahan yahay.

segment.source: That email address is already registered.
segment.target: Ciwaanka iimeylkan horay ayaa loo diwaan geliyay.
Godka magac garashada waa loo baahan yahay.
Magaca-garashadan waa mid horay loo qaatay.
Godka nambar sireedka waa loo baahan yahay.

segment.target: Mar kale godka nambar sireedka waa loo bahan yahay.
Godka kooxda waa loo baahan yahay.
Nambarka sirta ee diwaan gelinta waa mid qalad ah.

segment.source: There are no more seats available using that registration code.
segment.target: Ma jiraan fadhiyo kale dheeriya oo la heli karo adigoo isticmaalaya nambar sireedkaas diwaan gelinta.

source.pc: Hi, {0}, and welcome to MCB’s Online Training for Peer Specialists!
You are on your personal home page.

On the right, you’ll see the course list. Click on a course title to reveal the course description and a summary of each lesson. As you work your way through the course, your status will be updated to reflect your progress.
Click the Launch button to the right of the available lesson to begin. The lessons must be taken in the order presented. When you complete a lesson, the next lesson will unlock.
You do not have to complete a lesson in one session. If you EXIT before completing a lesson, we’ll remember where you left off and bring you back to the right point when you return.
For your convenience, bookmark this page. Alternatively, sign in at www.mcboard.org.
Thank you for participating in this online training program. Thank you, too, for your commitment to helping others in their recovery journey.
NOTE: These courses are not designed to be viewed on a Smartphone. Please use a tablet, laptop or desktop computer.
For any technical or connection issues, please email us at {1}.

target.pc: Salaam, {0}, iyo kusoo dhawaaw Tobabbarka Onleynka MCB ee Xirfadlayaasha Taqasus ee Isku Asaaga!
Waxaad ku sugan tahay boggaaga hore ee shaqsi.

Dhanka midig, waxaad ka arki doonta liiska koorsada. Ku dhufo ciwaanka koorsada si aad u aragto sharaxaada koorsada iyo warbixinta kooban ee cashar walbo. Inta aad sii wado koorsada, waxaa la cusboneysiin doona heerka aad mareyso si ay uuga muuqato horumarka sameyneso.
Ku dhufo Kici badhanka midig ee casharka diyaarka ee aad bilaabeyso. Casharadu waa in loo qaato sida ay usoo kala horeyaan, waxaa furmaya casharka xigo.

Qasab ma ahan in aad hal waqti ku dhammeeyso cashar. Hadii aad KA BAXDO inta aadan dhameyn casharka, waxaan xasuusan doona halka aad kaga tagtay anagoo dib kaaga bilaabi doono halka ku haboon marka aad soo laabato.
Si ay kuugu fududaato, boggan bookmark ku keydso. Taa badalkeed, soo gal www.mcboard.org.
Waad ku mahadsan tahay ka qeyb qaadashada tobabarkan onleynka ah. Mahadsanid, sidoo kale, waan kaaga mahadcelineyna dadaalkaaga aad ku caawineyso dadka kale ee ku jira safarkooda dib usoo kabasho.
OGAYSIIS: Koorsadan looguma tallo gelin in Taleefan laga daawado. Fadlan isticmaal tableet, labtoob ama computerka weyn.
Waxii caawinaad farsamo ama qadka ah, fadlan inagala soo xiriir {1}.

segment.source: These courses are optional and were made available to you outside of a curriculum.
segment.target: Koorsooyinkan waa ikhtiyaari waxaana laguu diyaariyey meel ka baxsan manhajka.

source.pc: For any technical or connection issues, please email us at {0}.

pc.pc: This course is best viewed on a desktop or laptop computer, or on newer iPad or Android tablets. It is not designed to be viewed on a smartphone.
If you are taking the course in a corporate setting be sure that your organization allows access to external websites.
You do not have to complete the course in one session. We encourage you to press NEXT before exiting. Failing to do so will require you to view again the last viewed slide before moving forward.
This self-directed course has been designed to be completed in three hours. Your time to complete may vary.
Upon completion of the course you will receive a personalized Completion Certificate.
Windows: Chrome, Edge, Firefox (latest versions), and IE11.
Apple iOS tablets: Safari and Google Chrome (latest versions).
Android OS6 or later: Google Chrome (latest version).

target.pc: Waxii caawinaad farsamo ama qadka ah, fadlan inagala soo xiriir {0}.

pc.pc: Koorsadan waxa ay ku wanaagsan tahay in aad ku daawato kombiyutar weyn, laabtoob, ama iPad cusub ama taabletka Android. Looguma tallo gelin in taleefan lagu daawado.
Haddii aad koorsada shirkad ahaan u qaadaneyso hubso in shirkadaadu ogoshahay bogaga ka baxsan.

Qasab ma ahan in aad koorsada hal fadhi ku dhammeeyso. Waxaan kugu dhiiro gelineyna in aad taabato XIGA inta aadan ka ka bixin. Haddii aad sidaan sameyn weyso waxaad ku qasbanaan doonta in aad mar kale daawato boggii ugu danbeyay inta aadan horay usocon.
Koorsadan ee iska isku wadid ayaa loogu tallo galay in lagu dhammeeyo sadax saacadood. Waqtiga aad adiga ku dhammeeyneysid ayaa kala duwan.
Isla marka aad dhammeeyso koorsada waxaad heli doonta Shahaado Dhammeystir oo kuu gooniya.
Windows: Chrome, Edge, Firefox (nuuci ugu danbeyay), iyo IE11.
Mac: Safari iyo Firefox (nuuci ugu danbeyay).
Apple iOS taabletis: Safari iyo Google Chrome (nuuci ugu danbeyay).
Android OS6 ama waxii ka danbeyay: Google Chrome (nuuci ugu danbeyay).

segment.source: Our training programs are available in multiple languages. Choose your preferred language by pressing a button below.
segment.target: Tobabaradeena ayaad ku heli kartaa luuqado kala duwan. Dooro luuqada aad rabto adigoo riixaya badhanka hoose.

segment.source: Are you sure you wish to refund this purchase? You will no longer be able to access this curriculum.
segment.target: Ma hubtaa in aad rabto in aad ceshato lacagta ku iibsatay? Masii awoodi doonto in aad sii isticmaasho manhajkan.

segment.source: This is an unknown purchase and cannot be refunded.
segment.target: Tani waa iibsasho aan lagaraneynin dibna lacagta looma soo celin karo.

segment.source: This purchase has already been refunded.
segment.target: Iibsashadan mar hore ayaa laga laabtay, dibna waa looso celiyay.

segment.source: This purchase is older than seven days and cannot be refunded.
segment.target: Iibsashadan waxa ay ka badan tahay todobo maalin dibna looma soo celin karo.

segment.source: This purchase has been launched and cannot be refunded.
segment.target: Iibsashadan waa la bilaabay lagamana laaban karo.

segment.source: There is no credit card transaction associated with this purchase so it cannot be refunded automatically.
segment.target: Wax kaarka iibsashada lala xiriirin karo iibsashadan ma jirto marka si otomaatik ah dib looguma soo celin karo.

segment.source: If you need further assistance, please contact support at {0}.
segment.target: Haddii aad u baahan tahay caawinaad dheeriya, fadlan lasoo xiriir qeybta caawinaada ee {0}.
